name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Turbo IG Comment Export Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Extract Instagram comments to CSV with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free extract Instagram comments and export to CSV with one click

Free Export IG comments to Excel CSV formats

Free Turbo IG Comment Export is a tool that export comments from Instagram to CSV.

Features:
* Free Export comments with one click
* Export up to 10,000 comments for free.
* CSV formats support
* Handles IG rate limit errors


Supported columns:
- Instagram Profile URL
- Instagram Avatar URL
- ID (Instagram ID)
- User name
- Comment
- Date

How to use:
1. Open the extension’s popup by clicking the extension icon in the right section of the toolbar.
2. Select the “Home” Tab
3. Specify Comment URL
4. Click the “Export Comment” button and follow the instructions within the app
